description: The royal palace of Fish-Man Island, home to King Neptune and the royal family. Located in the center of Fish-Man Island.

keyEvents.title: Minister Reveals Tamate Box Bomb
keyEvents.description: At Ryugu Palace, the Minister of the Right reveals that the Tamate Box given to Big Mom contains explosives.
keyEvents.significance: Critical information that sets up future events in the Whole Cake Island arc.

keyEvents.title: Neptune Requests Straw Hat Flag
keyEvents.description: Neptune discusses with Jinbe at Ryugu Palace about requesting the Straw Hat flag for Fish-Man Island's protection.
keyEvents.significance: Shifts Fish-Man Island's allegiance from Big Mom to the Straw Hats.

statusHistory.reason: Royal palace continues to function under King Neptune

description: An underwater island located 10,000 meters below sea level, beneath the Red Line. Home to fish-men and merfolk, and a crucial waypoint for pirates traveling to the New World.

keyEvents.title: Caribou Attacks Pekoms
keyEvents.description: On Fish-Man Island, Caribou attempts to reclaim his treasure from Pekoms and is swiftly defeated.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the power difference between Paradise and New World pirates.

keyEvents.title: Fish-Man Island Changes Protection
keyEvents.description: Neptune decides to place Fish-Man Island under the Straw Hats' protection instead of Big Mom's.
keyEvents.significance: Major shift in the island's political allegiance with long-term consequences.

statusHistory.reason: Island continues to thrive after being saved from Hody Jones

description: The entrance to the New World portion of the Grand Line, located after Fish-Man Island. Heavily patrolled by G-5 Marines who intercept pirates entering from Paradise.

keyEvents.title: Smoker Patrols New World Entrance
keyEvents.description: Vice Admiral Smoker and the G-5 Marines intercept pirates fleeing from Fish-Man Island and entering the New World.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes this location as a major checkpoint and sets up Smoker's role in the New World.

keyEvents.title: G-5 Marines Debut at Entrance
keyEvents.description: Pike and Bomba make their first appearance at the New World entrance alongside Smoker.
keyEvents.significance: Introduction of G-5 unit and their role in New World security.

statusHistory.reason: Continues to serve as the main entrance to the New World

description: A Marine base located in the New World near the Red Line. Officially called Marine Grand Line Fifth Branch, it's known for having problematic marines and is commanded by Vice Admiral Smoker.

keyEvents.title: G-5 Base Operations Shown
keyEvents.description: The G-5 Marine Base is revealed as Smoker's new posting, from which he patrols the New World entrance.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces an important Marine installation that will play a role in the Punk Hazard arc.

statusHistory.reason: Marine base continues operations under Smoker's command
